trans-unit.source: Authenticates a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token.
trans-unit.target: Autentica um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Use the SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator class to authenticate <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar a classe de SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator para autenticar <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tokens de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class using the specified set of authenticators.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> utilizando o conjunto especificado de autenticadores de classe.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> that contains the authenticators to authenticate the issuer's <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> de <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> que contém os autenticadores para autenticar o emissor <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> tokens de segurança.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class using the specified set of authenticators and the maximum allowable difference between the sender's and receiver's clocks.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> classe utilizando o conjunto especificado de autenticadores e a máxima permitida diferença entre os relógios do remetente e do recetor.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> that contains the authenticators to authenticate the issuer's <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> de <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> que contém os autenticadores para autenticar o emissor <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> tokens de segurança.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the maximum allowable difference between the sender's and receiver's clocks.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.TimeSpan>que representa a máxima permitida diferença entre os relógios do remetente e do recetor.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of target URIs for which the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token can be targeted for to be considered valid by this <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de URIs de destino para o qual o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança pode ser visado para ser considerado válido por este <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Use the AllowedAudienceUris property in a federated application that utilizes a security token service (STS) that issues <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de AllowedAudienceUris numa aplicação federada que utiliza um serviço de token de segurança (STS) que emite <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tokens de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: When the STS issues the security token, it can specify the URI of the Web services for which the security token is intended by adding a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition> to the security token.
trans-unit.target: Quando o STS emite o token de segurança, pode especificar o URI dos serviços Web para o qual o token de segurança destina-se ao adicionar um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>para o token de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>

trans-unit.source: That allows the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator> for the recipient Web service to verify that the issued security token is intended for this Web service by specifying that this check should happen by doing the following: - Set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AudienceUriMode%2A> property to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator>para o serviço Web destinatário verificar que o token de segurança emitido destina-se para este serviço Web, especificando que esta verificação deverá ocorrer ao fazer o seguinte:-definir a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AudienceUriMode%2A>propriedade ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AudienceUriMode%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the set of valid URIs, by adding the URIs to the AllowedAudienceUris collection.
trans-unit.target: -Especifique o conjunto de URIs válido, adicionando o URIs à coleção AllowedAudienceUris.

trans-unit.source: - Optionally, override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateAudienceRestriction%2A> method to specify the validation algorithm to use for the allowed URI.
trans-unit.target: -Opcionalmente, substituir o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateAudienceRestriction%2A>método para especificar o algoritmo de validação a utilizar para o URI permitido.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateAudienceRestriction%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of type <xref:System.String> that contains the target URIs for which the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token can be targeted for to be considered valid by this security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> do tipo <xref:System.String>que contém o URI de destino para o qual o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança pode ser visado para ser considerado válido com este autenticador de tokens de segurança.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode"></xref> that specifies whether the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token's <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref> should be validated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode"> </xref> que especifica se o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"> </xref> deve ser validada.

trans-unit.source: Use the AudienceUriMode property in a federated application that utilizes a security token service (STS) that issues <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de AudienceUriMode numa aplicação federada que utiliza um serviço de token de segurança (STS) que emite <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tokens de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: When the STS issues the security token, it can specify the URI of the Web services for which the security token is intended by adding a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition> to the security token.
trans-unit.target: Quando o STS emite o token de segurança, pode especificar o URI dos serviços Web para o qual o token de segurança destina-se ao adicionar um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>para o token de segurança.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>

trans-unit.source: That allows the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator> for the recipient Web service to verify that the issued security token is intended for this Web service by specifying that this check should happen by doing the following: - Set the AudienceUriMode property to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator>para o serviço Web destinatário verificar que o token de segurança emitido destina-se para este serviço Web, especificando que esta verificação deverá ocorrer ao fazer o seguinte:-definir a propriedade de AudienceUriMode ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the set of valid URIs, by adding the URIs to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AllowedAudienceUris%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: -Especifique o conjunto de URIs válido, adicionando o URI para o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AllowedAudienceUris%2A>coleção.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AllowedAudienceUris%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the AudienceUriMode property is set to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>, an incoming non-endorsing <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> must contain a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A> collection must contain a URI that matches one of the valid URIs specified in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AllowedAudienceUris%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando AudienceUriMode a propriedade está definida como <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>, uma entrada não-endossamento <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tem de conter um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A>coleção tem de conter um URI que corresponda a um válido de URIs especificado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AllowedAudienceUris%2A>coleção.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AllowedAudienceUris%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition.Audiences%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>

trans-unit.source: A non-endorsing or bearer token is a security token that is included in the message and not used to sign any part of the message.
trans-unit.target: Um não endossamento ou portador token é um token de segurança que está incluído na mensagem e não utilizado para assinar qualquer parte da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: - Optionally, override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateAudienceRestriction%2A> method to specify the validation algorithm to use for the allowed URI.
trans-unit.target: -Opcionalmente, substituir o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateAudienceRestriction%2A>método para especificar o algoritmo de validação a utilizar para o URI permitido.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateAudienceRestriction%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode"></xref> that specifies whether the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token's <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref> should be validated.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode"> </xref> que especifica se o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"> </xref> deve ser validada.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o token de segurança especificado pode ser validado por este autenticador de tokens de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The CanValidateTokenCore method does not authenticate the security token; that is performed by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método CanValidateTokenCore não autentica o token de segurança; que é executada a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> para ser validado.

trans-unit.source: when token is a security token; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: when token is a security token; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Resolves the identity associated with the specified key identifier using the supporting security authenticators provided when the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> instance was created and returns it as a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resolve a identidade associada com o identificador de chave especificado utilizando os suporte autenticadores de segurança fornecidos quando o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> instância foi criada e devolve-o como um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> to get the identity of.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref> ao obter a identidade do.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that represents the identity of the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref> que representa a identidade do identificador de chave especificado.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the identity associated with the specified security token using the supporting token authenticators provided when the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> instance was created and returns it as a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resolve a identidade associada ao token de segurança especificado utilizando os suporte autenticadores de token fornecidos quando o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> instância foi criada e devolve-o como um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to get the identity of.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ao obter a identidade do.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"></xref> that represents the identity of the specified security token.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Claims.ClaimSet"> </xref> que representa a identidade do token de segurança especificados.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the identity associated with the specified key identifier using the supporting security token authenticators provided when the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> instance was created and returns it as an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: Resolve a identidade associada com o identificador de chave especificado utilizando os suporte autenticadores token de segurança fornecidos quando o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> instância foi criada e devolve-lo como um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens are cached using their key identifier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tokens de segurança são colocadas em cache utilizando o respetivo identificador da chave.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"></xref> to get the identity of.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier"> </xref> ao obter a identidade do.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> that represents the identity of the specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>que representa a identidade do identificador de chave especificado.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>

trans-unit.source: Resolves the identity associated with the specified security token using the supporting security token authenticators provided when the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> instance was created and returns it as an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>.
trans-unit.target: Resolve a identidade associada ao token de segurança especificado utilizando os suporte autenticadores token de segurança fornecidos quando o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator"> </xref> instância foi criada e devolve-lo como um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to get the identity of.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> ao obter a identidade do.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity> that represents the identity of the specified security token.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>que representa a identidade do token de segurança especificados.</xref:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity>

trans-unit.source: Validates that the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token was intended for this Web service.
trans-unit.target: Valida que o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> token de segurança foi concebido para este serviço Web.

trans-unit.source: The ValidateAudienceRestriction method is called by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> method when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AudienceUriMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>.
trans-unit.target: O método de ValidateAudienceRestriction é chamado <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>método quando a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AudienceUriMode%2A>propriedade está definida como <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.AudienceUriMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.AudienceUriMode%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"></xref> that specifies the set of target Web services for which the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"></xref> security token is intended.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition"> </xref> que especifica o conjunto de serviços Web de destino para o qual o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken"> </xref> destina-se o token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: if the property of the audienceRestrictionCondition parameter is in the collection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Se o <> *> propriedade o audienceRestrictionCondition parâmetro está a ser o <> *> coleção; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
trans-unit.target: Autentica o token de segurança especificado e devolve o conjunto de políticas de autorização para o token de segurança.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> to be validated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"> </xref> para ser validado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies that result from the security token authentication.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> que contém o conjunto de políticas de autorização que resultam da autenticação de token de segurança.
